body: @wolf-of-moon cuz if u read the earlier work with the same name cupid by ponsuke you'd know that is the guy she turned down. which her little sister likes (and in the previous work her little sister succeeded in making him like her back so this is right after the beginning of the earlier work by ponsuke)
